index.subtitle: Grunt
index.about: Grunt is a task runner, with huge ecosystem of literally hundreds of plugins to choose it, you can use Grunt to automate just about anything with a minimum of effort. If someone hasn't already built what you need, authoring and publishing your own Grunt plugin to npm is a breeze.

videos.title: Task Automation with GruntJS hangouts
videos.description: A hangouts about Grunt Task Automation.

videos.title: Task Automation with GruntJS
videos.description: A presentation by Hugo Bessa about Grunt.js.

videos.title: Introduction to Grunt
videos.description: In this lesson you will install GruntJS and get up and running with your first task, initial configuration, and how to get Grunt methods auto-completing in WebStorm.

videos.title: Multitask
videos.description: Grunt Multitask allows you to write complex tasks that run multiple targets. In this lesson, John will show you how to use Multitask in your GruntJS builds.

videos.title: Minifying your output with Grunt uglify
videos.description: For production we want to use minified javascript to reduce the payload that is sent from the server. This can easily be accomplished with grunt-uglify.
